name: Red Pepe
description: Red Pepe is a memecoin project with a mission to become the next big Pepe memecoin. Our goal is to create a fun and engaging platform for the crypto community, where users can participate in farming/staking, collect unique NFTs, and influence the future of the project through governance tokens. By conquering one Pepe at a time, we aim to create a community-driven project that offers real value to its users. Red Pepe, RedPepe - Is Next gen memetic Red power, With No tax and Transaction Limit , Because Our Team Wants You Aimed At The Moon As Well.
